speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Lisa calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm okay, thanks. What's this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm contacting you regarding your account with Global Finance. Before I provide any details, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you also provide me with your current address for verification?

speaker: Agent
text: Great, thank you! I see you have an outstanding balance of $450. How would you like to handle this today?

speaker: Customer
text: I can't pay it all right now, but I can do $150 today.

speaker: Agent
text: That's fine. I can note that payment. Would you prefer to pay by card or bank transfer?

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect! I will guide you through the payment process. Thank you for your cooperation.

speaker: Agent
text: You’re welcome! If you have any questions, feel free to call us back. Have a great day!
